BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} first awakened on this RimWorld as an infantile intelligence.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: synstruct
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was first awakened on this world. The story for {PAWN_nameDef} has yet to be truly written.
